channel.title: RuneTrocity 2007 Remake
channel.description:
[size=18pt][CENTER][COLOR=black][URL=http://"http://RuneTrocity.com/play.html"]Play[/URL][/COLOR] [COLOR=blue][URL=http://"http://RuneTrocity.com"]Website[/URL][/COLOR] [COLOR=blue][URL=http://"http://RuneTrocity.enjin.com"]Forums[/URL][/COLOR] [COLOR=blue][URL=http://"http://RuneTrocity.com/Download.html"]Download[/URL][/COLOR] [COLOR=blue][URL=http://"http://RuneTrocity.com/donate.html"]Donate[/URL][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[COLOR=green][SIZE=8pt][B][CENTER]2007 Remake[/CENTER][/COLOR] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/teHlxcL.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=5][COLOR=green]Why Are we better then Runescape's oldschool servers?[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=4][COLOR=green]Well here you go:[/COLOR] [I][COLOR=red]1.You can play for FREE. 2.EXP is FASTER. 3.Money making is FASTER. 4.The Community does not allow flaming. it results in 24hour mute then perm mute. 5.You control what RuneTrocity's Development team does next! [/I][/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FF00"][B][SIZE=6]Also, please do not say "NOT 07 Because it has a few tweaks. Would you play if you couldn't get enough arrows or runes? Didn't think so. shops are only there till we get a bigger player base.
And, Scythes are dopped by cows. "NOT 07" calm your panis. it's still 07. You didn't bitch at oldschool for releasing massive rares. I HAVE TO introduce rares. And making them drop, makes players train.[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][B][SIZE=6]Currently we have a lot of work to do to the server. So please, if something doesn't work, just tell Frankie and he will get his team to it. Some Skills work, Mostly only basics.[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [SIZE=5]Woodcutting = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] FireMaking =[COLOR=green] Working[/COLOR] Cooking =[COLOR=green] Working[/COLOR] Fletching = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Fishing = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Mining = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Magic = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Range = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Melee = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Prayer = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Theiving = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Slayer = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Herbelore = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Agilty = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Smithing = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR] Farming = [COLOR=red]Broken[/COLOR] RuneCrafting = [COLOR=red]Broken[/COLOR] Crafting = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=7][CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"]Become Part of the movement![/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://ReunTrocity.com"]www.RuneTrocity.com[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE] [/B]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FF00"]Coders![/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Wanna become part of the team? Message me on here, or in game. Please only experienced coders only.[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=6]The ONLY custom shops: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rjh50Op.png[/img] [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/8316/3bey.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jVHsulM.png[/img] The rest are like real runescape. So please stop saying "too custom" There isn't enough players to not have the shops! Enjoy! ~RuneTrocity.com[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]

item.title: RuneTrocity 2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @uberape uberape
item.description:
@uberape wrote:

[size=18pt][CENTER][COLOR=black]Play[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Website[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Forums[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Download[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Donate[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[COLOR=green][SIZE=8pt][B][CENTER]2007 Remake[/CENTER][/COLOR]
[CENTER]

[SIZE=5][COLOR=green]Why Are we better then Runescape’s oldschool servers?[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=green]Well here you go:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]1.You can play for FREE.
2.EXP is FASTER.
3.Money making is FASTER.
4.The Community does not allow flaming. it results in 24hour mute then perm mute.
5.You control what RuneTrocity’s Development team does next!
[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR="#00FF00"][B][SIZE=6]Also, please do not say "NOT 07 Because it has a few tweaks.
Would you play if you couldn’t get enough arrows or runes?
Didn’t think so. shops are only there till we get a bigger player base.

And, Scythes are dopped by cows.
“NOT 07” calm your panis. it’s still 07.
You didn’t bitch at oldschool for releasing massive rares.
I HAVE TO introduce rares. And making them drop, makes players train.[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][SIZE=6]Currently we have a lot of work to do to the server.
So please, if something doesn’t work, just tell Frankie and he will get his team to it.
Some Skills work, Mostly only basics.[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]Woodcutting = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
FireMaking =[COLOR=green] Working[/COLOR]
Cooking =[COLOR=green] Working[/COLOR]
Fletching = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Fishing = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Mining = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Magic = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Range = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Melee = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Prayer = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Theiving = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Slayer = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Herbelore = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Agilty = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Smithing = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR]
Farming = [COLOR=red]Broken[/COLOR]
RuneCrafting = [COLOR=red]Broken[/COLOR]
Crafting = [COLOR=green]Working[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=7][CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"]Become Part of the movement![/COLOR]
www.RuneTrocity.com[/CENTER][/SIZE]

[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FF00"]Coders![/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Wanna become part of the team?
Message me on here, or in game.
Please only experienced coders only.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=6]The ONLY custom shops:

rjh50Op.png762×502


jVHsulM.png767×501

The rest are like real runescape.
So please stop saying “too custom”
There isn’t enough players to not have the shops!
Enjoy!
~RuneTrocity.com[/SIZE][/CENTER]
